biotools.summary: Excel encoded application (compatible with OpenOffice Calc) that includes various graphical and numerical outputs which allow NGS practitioners to assessing and comparing the precision in allele frequency estimation for both pool and diploid individual SNP data under various sampling, coverage and experimental error designs.

bioschemas.name: PIFs
